author: Nicolas Barlow 💙🇬🇧🇺🇦
text: Please #VoteConservative 🔵 in today's local elections to enable me to continue working for you in Wollaston and Stourbridge Town. Every vote matters. Thank you. https://t.co/gvBoUVt6R0

author: Nicolas Barlow 💙🇬🇧🇺🇦
text: Just one day left. Every vote is important to enable me to continue as your local Councillor for Wollaston and Stourbridge Town, focusing on local issues. Please turn out tomorrow to #VoteConservative 🔵 https://t.co/ID4nhxUxwQ

author: Nicolas Barlow 💙🇬🇧🇺🇦
text: With less than a week to polling day, please don't forget to return your completed postal vote. Every vote is important to enable me to continue as your local Councillor for Wollaston and Stourbridge Town, focusing on local issues. Please turn out to #VoteConservative 🔵 on 5 May https://t.co/n9YBSGgxif

author: Nicolas Barlow 💙🇬🇧🇺🇦
text: Sorry to hear Walsall Councillor Stephen Craddock is standing down but understand decision. Very hardworking, dedicated guy & my portfolio holder equivalent, former colleague on West Midlands Fire & Rescue Authority. Huge loss, I wish him well for the future. @WalsallTory https://t.co/b2GpnNOc9I

author: Nicolas Barlow 💙🇬🇧🇺🇦
text: With just over a week to polling day, please don't forget to return your completed postal vote. Every vote is important to enable me to continue as your local Councillor for Wollaston and Stourbridge Town, focusing on local issues. Please #VoteConservative 🔵 on 5 May. @CCACllrs https://t.co/5iKa4JpBMn

author: Nicolas Barlow 💙🇬🇧🇺🇦
text: Amazing turnaround. With right support, and determination, anything's possible. Mental ill health and alcoholism put you in an incredibly dark and dangerous place but never give up hope. Please don't suffer in silence, don't let others crush you. Talk to orgns such as @samaritans https://t.co/Nnqm8XUq4f

author: Nicolas Barlow 💙🇬🇧🇺🇦
text:
Wordle 307 6/6. I'd be no good on Countdown 🙄

author: Nicolas Barlow 💙🇬🇧🇺🇦
text: Please don't forget you can get a postal vote if you are unable to get to your polling station on 5th May. Deadline is 5pm today! Your vote will make a difference #Dudley #Stourbridge #Wollaston https://t.co/LiyJgmMSo5

author: Nicolas Barlow 💙🇬🇧🇺🇦
text: Compulsory Purchase powers need strengthening. Stourbridge & Dudley have many empty shops; sadly, some owners refuse to engage and would rather see large filthy buildings rot away. We need quality businesses investing plus decent affordable accommodation, not squalid bedsits/HMOs https://t.co/uOTUXl5nAf

author: Nicolas Barlow 💙🇬🇧🇺🇦
text: Postal votes for the local elections have started to be delivered. Your vote is important. Please #VoteConservative on 5 May 🔵 Think Local, Vote Local #Wollaston #Stourbridge https://t.co/DiuBQbF3Z5

author: Nicolas Barlow 💙🇬🇧🇺🇦
text: Spent this afternoon at @DudleyGroupNHS's ED [Russells Hall Hospital] with a neighbour. Excellent, attentive staff. Well done and thank you.

author: Nicolas Barlow 💙🇬🇧🇺🇦
text:
Your vote can make a difference on 5th May ❎
Please ensure you are registered to vote
Sign up for a postal vote
❤️🧡💛💚💙💜🖤 https://t.co/waarNGSklo

author: Nicolas Barlow 💙🇬🇧🇺🇦
text: Why on earth has my @Twitter feed started to be bombarded by China-based adverts?!

author: Nicolas Barlow 💙🇬🇧🇺🇦
text: Living with Covid-19 brings many challenges. If you're having difficulties with your mental health, help is available. For 24/7 help in a crisis, you can call the Black Country mental health support line on 0800 008 6516.
